transcript:
Customer: Hello
Executive: Hello
Customer: Haan kaun?
Executive: Sir Akash baat kar raha hu IndiaMART se abhi sir aapse baat hui thi video meeting.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Sir aapne sir WhatsApp pe jo feedback aaya tha call ka to wo feedback aapne diya hai aapke father ne diya hai sir wo feedback?
Customer: Shayad papa diye honge.
Executive: Sir usme unhone not satisfied mark kar diya hai.
Customer: Achha hum baat kara dete hain unse.
Executive: Ek baar baat kariye sir aapko dikkat nahi hoti service mein sir unhone not satisfied mark kar diya hai.
Customer: Chaliye Akash.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Pandit ji good morning sir.
Customer: Good morning sir boliye na kaha kaam um jaraha aapko order order nahi le raha.
Executive: Sir abhi meri aapke bete se baat hui thi.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Unko samjhaya cheezo ko kaise follow karna hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Unhone samjha maine pucha ki koi dikkat to nahi hai bataiye.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Theek hai. Abhi sir aapka aaj ek mahina hua hai. Aapka aapki service ko ek mahina hua hai aaj.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
Customer: Haan haan ek mahina ho gaya.
Executive: Haan haan to aapke paas pattern bana kuch aapne lead consume ki aap lead bhi nahi consume ki service mein aapne keval ek hi product lead consume ki service mein jo maine unko bataya.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Maine unko ek sheet khol ke dikhai ki sir aapne keval ek hi product lead jyada consume ki hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Baki aapne lead consume nahi ki hai buyer se baat karani hai theek hai sir.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Abhi aapki service ko ek month hua hai aap consume kiya aapne bahut kam kiya jo ki aapko 17 milta hai pure week mein aapko whole week mili hai 17 lead jo ki aapne lead consume nahi ki hai.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: To sir service lete time aapko bataya gaya tha na ki sir aapko usme lead consume karni hai.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
Customer: Aur call bhi karni hai.
Executive: Call se suniye na suniye na call se hum 9 se 10 baje tak hai na.
Customer: Hmm hmm. Haan na 8 se 10 ke beech hum apna kaam karenge call se theek hai na.
Executive: Sir aap usko use karenge meri baat suniye par aap usko use karenge to business milega. Yadi sir dekhiye aap usko open karenge TSD band kar denge aap kisi buyer se baat nahi karoge to sir main khud bol raha hu sir aise business nahi milta hai.
Customer: Aaj.
Executive: Par aapki dukan open ho rakhi hai aapko grahak aa raha hai lekin aap usse baat nahi kar rahe ho.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: To sir kya uski deal hogi.
Customer: Sir suniye na. Start ke pehle hum baat kar rahe the to wo log bol raha tha ki hum hi aapko denge. Hum isi ka aapko kiye the.
Customer: Hmm.
Customer: Hum to bechne wale na hai. To fir wo humko bechne wale se aap log karwa dete hain.
Executive: Sir meri baat suniye.
Customer: Haan boliye.
Executive: Sir ye hai ek open market theek hai online.
Customer: Haan online market haan.
Executive: Ab sir dekhiye yaha par koi pabandi to hai nahi hai ki sir jaise main product comment dalunga to mujhko koi mana kar dega kya nahi karega aap dalenge aapko koi mana nahi karega. Hamare yaha koi teesra person hota hai wo bhi dalega to usko mana nahi karega koi ki sir aap product nahi dalo is par.
Customer: Suniye na aapka customer humko suniye aap humko customer dijiyega kharidne wala na.
Executive: Theek hai sir.
Executive: Aapko kharidne wala customer denge aapko buyer denge seller nahi denge sir aapko.
Customer: Hmm teen buyer.
Executive: Aapko buyer hi denge.
Customer: Haan haan buyer denge haan. Sir dekhiye buyer ko bhi jaise seller jo hota hai sir usko bhi requirement hoti hai IndiaMART pe aisi baat nahi hai ki wo keval seller bana rahega usko koi product chahiye hoga IndiaMART pe sir wo requirement dalega.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Samajh pa rahe hain aap. Sir aap seller ho aapko koi product chahiye IndiaMART se.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Theek hai to aap requirement daloge na IndiaMART par ki mujhe ye product chahiye.
Customer: Haan.
Executive: Ab sir aapse koi supplier baat karega to aap bhi usko bataoge ki sir main bhi seller hu waise to lekin mujhe ye product chahiye yaha par.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Bologe na sir aap.
Customer: Haan haan.
Executive: Aise hi hota hai na. Ki aapko kuch requirement hai to aap bhi requirement daloge IndiaMART par.
Customer: Hmm hmm.
Executive: Par isme koi pabandi nahi hai ki sir dekhiye online yadi koi buyer aata hai to sir usme koi pabandi nahi hai ki usko bhi nahi dal payenge koi bhi dal sakta hai requirement. Lekin sir dekhiye ek baar aap usko open kar denge aise hi band kar denge IndiaMART ko to sir business nahi milega. Abhi meri aapke bete se baat hui maine unko samjhaya cheezo ko kaise follow karna hai kaise kya karna hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir maine unko bhi samjhaya ki lead consume wahi karni hai jo kaam ki hai jo kaam ki nahi hai wo lead consume nahi karni sir maine unko bhi samjhaya hai aur sir aapko bhi samjha raha hu ki jo kaam ki cheeze hain wahi aapko consume karni hai jo product ke relevant hai wahi consume karna hai aapko otherwise consume nahi karna hai.
Customer: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Ab sir dekhiye aapko ye feedback aaya tha call par aapne usko not satisfied mark kar diya hai.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Maine to unse pucha bhi tha ki sir koi dikkat to bataiye aap mujhe wo mana kar rahe the.
Customer: Theek hai hum aaj bhar busy hai theek hai.
Customer: Aaj bhar hum kuch nahi karenge kal se hum pura is par lag jate hain theek hai karenge theek hai na. Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai sir isko close kar raha hu theek hai. Haan sir aapke paas dobara feedback aayega ye.
Customer: Achha.
Executive: Theek hai sir. Haan theek hai.
Executive: Okay thank you so much sir.
Customer: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer is not getting enough orders.

- Customer marked the call feedback as not satisfied.

- Customer has not been consuming leads effectively.



Resolution:

- Executive explained how to follow up on leads.

- Executive clarified the platform's open market nature.

- Executive explained how to consume leads.



Next Steps: 

- Customer will start working on it from tomorrow.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Neutral



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, customer satisfaction, usage
